column4: hi guys, I have a quick question that hopefully will be easy.  On my windows machine I use pdfcreator to print to a virtual printer and print to TIFF (not pdf), then I have it automatically opening up that TIFF with my default program.  Does anyone know of any virtual printers like that for Ubuntu?  CUPS-PDF only prints pdf's
i cannot see any partition during installation
if you can't see partitions during install then sounds like your card isn't supported? that's just wierd cause 99% of configs are
it is supported . i installed gutsy earlier
